DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , open-labeled , non-comparative study examine safety efficacy ASP1585 long-term dosing chronic kidney disease hyperphosphatemia patient hemodialysis .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Study Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease Hyperphosphatemia Hemodialysis
